    Dictionary Calculations

Function reference

Search Codesets

Medical Coding & Billing Codesets.

get_addon_edits()
NCCI Add-On Code Edits
get_ptp_edits()
Procedure to Procedure (PTP) Edits
get_mue_edits()
NCCI Medically Unlikely Edits
search_adjustments()
Search Adjustment Codes
search_cpt()
HCPCS Level I (CPT) Codes
search_fee_schedule()
Search Physician Fee Schedule
search_gpci()
Physician Fee Schedule Geographic Practice Cost Indices
search_hcpcs()
HCPCS Level II Codes
search_in_if_args()
Search in data frame column if search term is not NULL
search_modifiers()
Level I and II HCPCS Modifiers
search_opps()
Outpatient Prospective Payment System (OPPS) Capitations
search_payment()
Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amount File
search_rbcs()
Search Restructured BETOS Classifications
search_rvu()
Physician Fee Schedule Relative Value File
lcd()
Local Coverage Determinations
ncd()
National Coverage Determinations

Calculations

Functions to calculate various metrics.

limiting_charge()
Calculate Limiting Charge
non_participating_fee()
Calculate Non-Participating Fee
calculate_amounts()
Calculate Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amounts

Validation Checks

Functions to validate inputs.

get_aoc_type()
HCPCS Add-On code type
is_category_I()
Check if code is HCPCS Level 1 Category I (CPT)
is_category_II()
Check if code is HCPCS Level 1 Category II
is_category_III()
Check if code is HCPCS Level 1 Category III
is_level_I()
Check if code is HCPCS Level I
is_level_II()
Check if code is HCPCS Level II
is_valid_length()
Check if string is valid length of a HCPCS code

Recoding Helpers

Utilities to label Codeset outputs.

search_in_if_args()
Search in data frame column if search term is not NULL
case_asc()
Replace HCPCS Level II ASC Group Indicator Descriptions
case_assistant()
Add Assistant Surgery Descriptions
case_bilateral()
Add Bilateral Surgery Descriptions
case_category()
Add CPT Category Labels
case_chapter()
Add HCPCS Level I & II Section Labels
case_chapter_cpt()
Add CPT Section Labels
case_chapter_hcpcs()
Add HCPCS Section Labels
case_cosurg()
Add Co-Surgeons Descriptions
case_global()
Add Global Days Descriptions
case_imaging()
Add Diagnostic Imaging Descriptions
case_labcert()
Add HCPCS Level II Lab Certification Descriptions
case_level()
Add HCPCS Level Labels
case_modifier()
Add Modifier Indicator Descriptions
case_multiple_pricing()
Add HCPCS Level II Multiple Pricing Indicator Descriptions
case_multproc()
Add Multiple Procedure Descriptions
case_opps()
Add OPPS Indicator Descriptions
case_pctc()
Add PCTC Indicator Descriptions
case_pricing()
Add HCPCS Level II Pricing Indicator Descriptions
case_status()
Replace Status Codes with Labels, Add Descriptions
case_supervision()
Add Physician Supervision Descriptions
case_team()
Add Team Surgery Descriptions
case_tos()
Add HCPCS Level II Type of Service Descriptions
case_coverage()
Replace HCPCS Level II Coverage Indicators with Descriptions
